description: Hi, Iâ€™m Shaun. I am currently studying computer science at Grove City College with a concentration in Data Science and Mobile Development.
I am an avid Linux enthusiast and never settle with the tools I use or my way of working. I am constantly seeking out new challenges and opportunities to learn.
When coding and I are on a break, I can be found hiking, gathered around a bonfire or binging British stand-up.
